basic.floral_language:
Thymus vulgaris
Floriography: courageous, lucky, noble
Is a spice plant with a strong aromatic flavour, has small oval shaped leaves in fresh green, has culinary, medicinal, and ornamental uses.
Likes sunshine, suitable for sunny places, shade properly under summer strong sunlight, flowering in July-August, pink or purple color.
basic.color: Leaf color green , flower color purple, pink

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, place under adequate light, shade properly under summer strong light
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, dilute fertilizers following instructions,  in early summer, spring and autumn apply fertilizers once monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove old diseased and dead leaves timely
